name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Alif-Lam-Ra; these are verses of the Book and the bright Qur’an.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The disbelievers will ardently wish that if only they had been Muslims! (At the time of death / in their graves / on the Day of Resurrection.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Leave them to eat and enjoy, and for aspiration to involve them in play – so they will shortly come to know.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And every dwelling that We destroyed, had a known decree for it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: No group may advance its appointed promise nor postpone it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they said, “O you upon whom the Qur’an has been sent, you are indeed insane.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Why do you not bring angels to us, if you are truthful?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We do not send down angels without reason, and if the angels descend they would not get any respite!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed We have sent down the Qur’an, and indeed We Ourselves surely are its Guardians. (This is one of the miracles of the Qur’an – no one has been able to change even one letter of its text, despite every effort. It has remained in its original form since the 6th Century (A. D) and will remain so forever. Other Holy Books such as the Torah and the Bible have lost their originality.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We sent Noble Messengers before you, to the former nations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And never does a Noble Messenger come to them, but they mock at him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We make the mocking* enter the hearts of the guilty. (* The acts of disbelief.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They do not believe in him, and the tradition of earlier nations has passed.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And if We open for them a gate in the heavens, to ascend it through the day –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Even then they would say, “Our sights have been hypnotised – in fact, a magic spell has been cast upon us.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We created towers in the skies, and beautified it for the beholders.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We have kept it guarded from every outcast devil.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except one who comes to eavesdrop – therefore a bright flame goes after him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We spread out the earth, and placed mountains as anchors in it, and in it grew all things by a proper measure.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And created livelihoods for you in it, and created those for whom you do not provide the sustenance.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And there is not a thing the treasure* of which is not with Us; and We do not send it down except by a known measure. (* The power to create it.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We sent the winds that relieve the clouds’ burden, therefore caused water to descend from the sky, then give it to you to drink; and you are not at all its treasurers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed it is We Who give life and it is We Who cause death, and We are the Inheritors.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We know those among you who came forward and indeed We know those among you who remained behind.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed your Lord only will raise them all on the Day of Resurrection; indeed only He is Wise, All Knowing.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed We created man from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And created the jinn before him, from smokeless fire.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And recall when your Lord said to the angels, “I will create man from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore when I have properly fashioned him and breathed into him a chosen noble soul from Myself, fall down before him in prostration.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore all the angels, each and every one of them, fell prostrate.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except Iblis (Satan); he refused to be among those who prostrated.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Allah, “O Iblis! What happened to you that you stayed apart from those who prostrated?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He answered, “It does not befit me to prostrate myself to a human whom You have created from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Allah, “Therefore exit from Paradise, for you are an outcast.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And indeed you are accursed till the Day of Judgement.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “My Lord! Grant me respite till the day when they will all be raised.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Allah, “You are of those given respite.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Till the Day of a well-known time.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “My Lord! I swear by the fact that You sent me astray, I shall distract them in the earth, and I shall lead all of them astray.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Except those among them who are Your chosen bondmen.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Said Allah, “This path* leads straight towards Me.” (* The path of the chosen bondmen.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Indeed you do not have any power over My bondmen, except those wanderers who follow you.” (The devil is unsuccessful in tempting Allah’s chosen bondmen to commit sin.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed hell is the promise for all of them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: It has seven gates; for each gate is a portion assigned from them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed the pious are amidst Gardens and springs.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Enter them with peace, in safety.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We have removed any resentments which were in their breasts – they are brothers, sitting face to face on thrones.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Neither any hardship is to reach them in it, nor are they to be expelled from it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Inform My bondmen that undoubtedly, I surely am the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And that indeed the punishment of Mine is a painful punishment.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And inform them of Ibrahim’s guests.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When the angels came to him and said, “Peace"; he said, “We feel afraid of you.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “Do not fear – we convey to you the glad tidings of a knowledgeable boy.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Do you convey to me the glad tidings upon old age reaching me? So upon what do you convey glad tidings?” (* Prophet Ibrahim said this out of surprise.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “We have given you true tidings, therefore do not lose hope.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “Who is it that despairs from the mercy of his Lord, except those who are astray?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “And what is your next task, O the sent angels?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Except the family of Lut; we shall rescue all of them.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Except his wife – we have decided that she is of those who will stay behind.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And when the sent angels came to the house of Lut.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “You are an unfamiliar people.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “In fact we have brought to you the matter which these people doubted.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And we have brought to you a true command, and indeed we are truthful.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Therefore journey with your household while a portion of the night remains, and you tread behind them – and none of you may turn around and see, and proceed directly to the place you are commanded to.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We informed him the decision of this command, that at morning the root of the disbelievers would be cut off.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And the people of the city came rejoicing. (* To the house of Prophet Lut.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “These are my guests – do not dishonour me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And fear Allah and do not disgrace me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “Had we not forbidden you from meddling in the affairs of anyone?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “These women of our tribe are my daughters, if you have to.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: By your life O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) – they are indeed straying in their intoxication.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore the scream overcame them at sunrise.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We turned the township upside down and rained upon them stones of heated clay.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this are signs for people who perceive.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed that township is upon a road still in use.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed in this are signs for the believers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed the Dwellers of the Woods were unjust.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We therefore took revenge from them; and indeed both these townships are situated on an open road.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And the people of the Hijr (rocks) denied the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We gave them Our signs, and they remained averse to them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they used to carve dwellings in the hills, without fear.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So the scream overcame them at morning.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore their earnings did not in the least benefit them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, except with the Truth; and indeed the Last Day will come, therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), forbear graciously.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed your Lord only is the Great Creator, the All Knowing.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We have given you seven verses that are repeated, and the great Qur’an.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Do not direct your eyes towards the things We have given to some of their couples to enjoy, and do not at all grieve because of them, and take the Muslims within the folds of your mercy.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And proclaim, “Indeed I, yes I, am the clear Herald of Warning.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: (Of a punishment) Like the one We sent down upon the dividers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Those who broke the Word of Allah into several parts. (Those who broke the Torah / Bible or changed its text – or those who called the Qur’an a fabrication / poetry.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore, by your Lord, We shall question every one of them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: About all what they used to do.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore publicly announce what you are commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed We suffice you against these mockers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Those who ascribe another God along with Allah; so they will soon come to know.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We know that you are disheartened by their speech.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore proclaim the Purity of your Lord with praise, and be of those who prostrate.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And keep worshipping your Lord, till death* comes to you. (* The certainty.)
